title: Future plans to lower ping?
body: I realize the servers moved to Chicago 2 years ago, but a man can still dream of the days when people on the west coast had 30 to 40 ping. Nowadays I get 70ish ping, and it discouraging sometimes for when it gets any higher on occasion.  I remember someone mentioning that the server in chicago and a server in seattle would be joined as one in some form or another in future plans? So I was wondering what progress, if any, has there been in reducing the ping for the west coast? Any info or insight is appreciated. Thanks

replies.body: Your higher ping could be due to other factors than just physical, if it's bad enough that you're noticing delays.  This could be local problems or how your ISP is reaching riot direct.  Grab [WinMTR ](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)and run a traceroute to the server:  104.160.131.1.  Run it for a few minutes and let me know what you find.  I have no say in where our servers go, but I'm happy to help troubleshoot with issues reaching our game server.
